$interpreted:
Diana: That's... godfather!?
Why'd he dressed like that? And is he... singing?
Diana: So he took off just so he could join the celebration!? Seriously?
Lazer: "Ohh the wind sings a lonely song~"
Lazer: "But blowing past, I know I'm not alone~"
Lazer: "And so I write these words for you~"
Lazer: "Ohhh~ Come and make merry, merry with me~"
Lazer: "Ohh yeahh~ Come on and make a wonderful memory~"
Diana: Is this a... diary?
Diana: 13th of Dawn Month...
Old Diary: "That girl from the village came over to confess her love to Lazer again."
Old Diary: "Heh... and he was acting like it was a big pain in the butt..."
Old Diary: "If we hadn't been friends for so long, I probably would have believed him, too."
Old Diary: "I mean, everyone in the village knows how much of a ladies man Lazer is."
Diana: ...So he knew my godfather?
Old Diary: "5th of Rain Month..."
Old Diary: "I know Lazer told me not to go farm all the way up into the mountains, but how was I supposed to just sit around with the village in need?"
Old Diary: "But now my legs... they're totally useless."
Old Diary: "I guess, on the bright side, I woulda been dead by now if Lazer hadn't found me and pulled me out of that rock slide."
Old Diary: "And I'd be lying if it wasn't nice seeing him lose his cool and get all worked up for once."
Diana: Lazer... lose his cool?
Old Diary: "8th of Fog Month..."
Old Diary: "It's finished! We shared a bottle of pear wine and finally got to writing the rest of our poem, 'A Poem for Friends'."
Old Diary: "With friends like this... I just hope our friendship lasts forever. I know it will."
Old Diary: "1st of Dawn Month"
Old Diary: "Lazer's been recruited... All the men in the village have left to fight for our kingdom."
Old Diary: "Now it's just me left here... some useless invalid."
Old Diary: "Lazer, please be safe on the battlefield. And do our kingdom proud, get those lizards out of here."
Diana: Fight for our kingdom...
Old Diary: "6th of Snow Month..."
Old Diary: "No way! There's no way Lazer could do what they say he did... killing our king..."
Old Diary: "He's got to have been framed! Our enemy's planting lies!"
Old Diary: "9th of Rain Month..."
Old Diary: "Lazer, I want so badly to believe you, but... all that evidence... You betrayed us, didn't you!? You betrayed the Kingdom of the Sun!"
Diana: ......
Old Diary: "16th of Maple Month..."
Old Diary: "I can't believe some invalid like me could still have a chance to serve his kingdom."
Old Diary: "His Majesty is so great, so giving, so let me join the ranks of His Majesty's special forces."
Old Diary: "Still, I know my place... It all has to do with that old 'friend' of mine..."
Old Diary: "Don't worry, Your Majesty. I, Baird, won't let you down."
Old Diary: "You just wait, old friend. I'll sing you a new song. A song of justice."
Diana: Over there!
Lazer: You really think hiding in the crowd would work? Think again!
Assassin: Pfft! Don't let him scare you! I'm pretty sure the lot of us can handle the one of him!
Lazer: And then there was one. Gonna keep hiding in the back, are you?
Lazer: ...Pear trees... Just like the pear trees of my home town...
???: Correction... the pear trees of our home town.
Lazer: Baird...
Baird: Surprised you still remember me, Lazer Bernard.
Lazer: ......
Lazer: Well that explains why I'm hearing that song all the way out in the Desert Kingdom.
Baird: And you know why I picked that song?
Baird: I picked it because I knew you wouldn't be able to ignore it. Because we wrote that song together.
Lazer: What's the point of all this now? That's in the past!
: You're not wrong.
Baird: The people who wrote that song are long gone.
Baird: Look at me... I'm slow, I'm useless... And if you had one shred of guilt left...
Baird: Then I pray to the sun, I pray to let me see that old Lazer one more time.
Lazer: Pray to the sun, pray to the gods—pray all you want!
Lazer: Prayers won't bring back lost time! You can't relive the past!
Baird: Hmph... you...
Lazer: What a joke... For Theodore to think sending someone like you would end up changing anything.
Lazer: If I were him, I'd start by threatening my family. That might work a bit better.
Lazer: Too bad they're all dead already. Dead men don't make good hostages.
Baird: You...!!
Baird: Gyaahh!! My eyes!!
Lazer: Get it, now? That's the price you pay for being my friend. Any friend I have just ends up dead, alone in the dark.
Baird: Lazer... Bernard...
Lazer: If you understand, then get the hell out of here.
Lazer: Hold on.
Baird: Had a change of heart?
Lazer: Why'd you plant a pear tree here?
Baird: ...When you've been away from home for so long... what's the thing you want most?
Baird: What do you think?
Lazer: ...It's overkill.
Diana: Godfather...
Lazer: ...What are you doing here?
Diana: That person just now...
Lazer: ...Don't worry about him. Even if he gets back, he'll be a deadman.
Diana: (No... you cut him intentionally, didn't you? So they don't press him... so they keep him alive...)
Diana: Is that worth it?
Lazer: Worth it...? Here in the desert, that doesn't make much of a difference.
Lazer: Deserts don't have pear trees... Never did, never will!

Model.Text:
That's... godfather!?
Why'd he dressed like that? And is he... singing?
So he took off just so he could join the celebration!? Seriously?
"Ohh the wind sings a lonely song~"
"But blowing past, I know I'm not alone~"
"And so I write these words for you~"
"Ohhh~ Come and make merry, merry with me~"
"Ohh yeahh~ Come on and make a wonderful memory~"
Is this a... diary?
13th of Dawn Month...
"That girl from the village came over to confess her love to Lazer again."
"Heh... and he was acting like it was a big pain in the butt..."
"If we hadn't been friends for so long, I probably would have believed him, too."
"I mean, everyone in the village knows how much of a ladies man Lazer is."
...So he knew my godfather?
"5th of Rain Month..."
"I know Lazer told me not to go farm all the way up into the mountains, but how was I supposed to just sit around with the village in need?"
"But now my legs... they're totally useless."
"I guess, on the bright side, I woulda been dead by now if Lazer hadn't found me and pulled me out of that rock slide."
"And I'd be lying if it wasn't nice seeing him lose his cool and get all worked up for once."
Lazer... lose his cool?
"8th of Fog Month..."
"It's finished! We shared a bottle of pear wine and finally got to writing the rest of our poem, 'A Poem for Friends'."
"With friends like this... I just hope our friendship lasts forever. I know it will."
"1st of Dawn Month"
"Lazer's been recruited... All the men in the village have left to fight for our kingdom."
"Now it's just me left here... some useless invalid."
"Lazer, please be safe on the battlefield. And do our kingdom proud, get those lizards out of here."
Fight for our kingdom...
"6th of Snow Month..."
"No way! There's no way Lazer could do what they say he did... killing our king..."
"He's got to have been framed! Our enemy's planting lies!"
"9th of Rain Month..."
"Lazer, I want so badly to believe you, but... all that evidence... You betrayed us, didn't you!? You betrayed the Kingdom of the Sun!"
"16th of Maple Month..."
"I can't believe some invalid like me could still have a chance to serve his kingdom."
"His Majesty is so great, so giving, so let me join the ranks of His Majesty's special forces."
"Still, I know my place... It all has to do with that old 'friend' of mine..."
"Don't worry, Your Majesty. I, Baird, won't let you down."
"You just wait, old friend. I'll sing you a new song. A song of justice."
Over there!
You really think hiding in the crowd would work? Think again!
Pfft! Don't let him scare you! I'm pretty sure the lot of us can handle the one of him!
And then there was one. Gonna keep hiding in the back, are you?
...Pear trees... Just like the pear trees of my home town...
Correction... the pear trees of our home town.
Baird...
Surprised you still remember me, Lazer Bernard.
Well that explains why I'm hearing that song all the way out in the Desert Kingdom.
And you know why I picked that song?
I picked it because I knew you wouldn't be able to ignore it. Because we wrote that song together.
What's the point of all this now? That's in the past!
You're not wrong.
The people who wrote that song are long gone.
Look at me... I'm slow, I'm useless... And if you had one shred of guilt left...
Then I pray to the sun, I pray to let me see that old Lazer one more time.
Pray to the sun, pray to the gods—pray all you want!
Prayers won't bring back lost time! You can't relive the past!
Hmph... you...
What a joke... For Theodore to think sending someone like you would end up changing anything.
If I were him, I'd start by threatening my family. That might work a bit better.
Too bad they're all dead already. Dead men don't make good hostages.
Gyaahh!! My eyes!!
Get it, now? That's the price you pay for being my friend. Any friend I have just ends up dead, alone in the dark.
Lazer... Bernard...
If you understand, then get the hell out of here.
Hold on.
Had a change of heart?
Why'd you plant a pear tree here?
...When you've been away from home for so long... what's the thing you want most?
What do you think?
...It's overkill.
Godfather...
...What are you doing here?
That person just now...
...Don't worry about him. Even if he gets back, he'll be a deadman.
(No... you cut him intentionally, didn't you? So they don't press him... so they keep him alive...)
Is that worth it?
Worth it...? Here in the desert, that doesn't make much of a difference.
Deserts don't have pear trees... Never did, never will!

You can't relive the past!","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_002","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"fest_025_002_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Baird","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3528c3","IconName":"h3528c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmph... you...","sfxName":"human_male_middle_royal_10_ver2","sfxVolume":0.9},{"ID":"fest_025_002_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0196","IconName":"h0196s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What a joke...
